member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession
member.summary: The data object for the Solution Builder build session.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.BuildEventsNonProject
member.summary: Build events for the session (errors, warnings, console output, and status messages from the engine) that do not fall into any of the projects. The success/failure state of the whole build session is derived from presense of any errors messages in these events and the events of all the projects.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.BuildSeverity
member.summary: How severe should the rebuild be.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.Dispatcher
member.summary: Identifies the main thread. All of the non-constant access should occur on this thread.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.Projects
member.summary: The list of projects known to this session, in various build states. Initially empty, filled with project when the build gets .

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.State
member.summary: Build session state.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.#ctor(JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath,JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionSeverity,JetBrains.Util.FileSystemPath[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Ctor.
member.param: URI of the solution file to be built.
How severe should the build be.
The projects that must be built (when we build up to them, we might stop). Empty to build the full set of projects.
Name of the solution configuration. Project configurations are taken from the configuration manager that maps solution-wide configs to per-project configs.
Name of the solution platform. Project platforms are taken from the configuration manager that maps solution-wide platforms to per-project platforms.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Whether the build session has errors, warnings, etc, or not.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionErrorStatus.Clean
member.summary: No errors, no warnings.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionErrorStatus.Warnings
member.summary: The project has some warnings (but no errors).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionErrorStatus.Errors
member.summary: The project has some errors (maybe also warnings).

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionEx.CreateBuildEventsAddRemove(JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession,JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime)
member.summary: A composite signal that fires whenever a build event is added to session events or to any of the projects in the session. A new instance is created each time you call the method.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionEx.CreateProjectErrorStatus(JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProject,JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime)
member.summary: Creates a property that accumulates the project error status from the project's build events. A new property and new event watcher is created each time you call the method.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionEx.CreateProjectFullPathCache(JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession)
member.summary: Creates a cache for getting the build setting project by its full path (cache throws if the element is missing). Note: every time you call this method, a NEW cache is created, whose lifetime is as long as 's.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionEx.CreateProjectFullPathCache2(JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession,JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime)
member.summary: Creates a cache for getting the build setting project by its full path. The cache is live, ie when new projects are added to the session, they also get into the cache. Note: every time you call this method, a NEW cache is created, whose lifetime is as long as 's. Dispose of the cache to break the connection.

member.name: M:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionEx.CreateSessionErrorStatus(JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSession,JetBrains.DataFlow.Lifetime)
member.summary: Creates a property that accumulates the project error status from the project's build events. A new property and new event watcher is created each time you call the method.

member.summary: Gets all of the build events for the current build session, which includes the project-related events for all of the projects and non-project build events.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProject
member.summary: Represents a single project in the build process.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProject.BuildEvents
member.summary: Build events for the current project (errors, warnings, console output, and status messages from the engine). The success/failure state of the project is derived from presense of any errors messages in the events.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProject.BuildState
member.summary: State of the project within the current build process.

summary.para: The identity of the project, usually, a path to the project file.
You MUST NOT assume that this is the project file, or if it is a file at all.
To transition between the and the corresponding , if any, use the and functions.

member.summary: Build state for a project in the build session.

member.summary: Will not be built in this session.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProjectBuildState.Pending
member.summary: Will be built in this session.

member.summary: Is currently being built.

member.summary: Has been built (or skipped due to being up-to-date, see error status).

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProjectErrorStatus
member.summary: Whether the project has errors, warnings, etc, or not.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProjectErrorStatus.Clean
member.summary: No errors, no warnings.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProjectErrorStatus.Warnings
member.summary: The project has some warnings (but no errors).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionProjectErrorStatus.Errors
member.summary: The project has some errors (maybe also warnings).

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionSeverity
member.summary: How severe should the rebuild be.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionSeverity.Clean
member.summary: All of the projects should be cleaned up.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionSeverity.Rebuild
member.summary: All of the projects should be rebuilt (cleaned up and built).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionSeverity.Build
member.summary: Only those project whose inputs were modified in respect to their outputs should be built. This represents the classical build algorithm.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionState
member.summary: Possible build session states.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionState.Waiting
member.summary: The session has just been created and is waiting for someone to run its build (which is not guaranteed to happen).

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionState.Running
member.summary: The build is currently running.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.BuildSessionState.Completed
member.summary: The build has completed, either successfully or with errors. is 1.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEvent
member.summary: A build event that occured while building of the project.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventImportance
member.summary: The importance of a build event. Originates from the MSBuild importance enum. Linear order: the lower the value, the more important is the event.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventKind
member.summary: Kinds of events logged when building projects or the session itself.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventKind.Output
member.summary: Messages logged with MSBuild logger. These do not include console output (eg from external tools). Could be of various importance.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventKind.Service
member.summary: Service messages from the engine: projects, targets, tasks. Usually have low importance.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventKind.Console
member.summary: Raw console output (StdOut stream) of the MSBuild process. Any fatal failures with running the MSBuild process would also go here.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventKind.Warning
member.summary: A warning logged with MSBuild logger. MSBuild tasks also would usually capture cmdline tool console output that qualifies against the warning pattern and report to the logger.

member.name: F:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventKind.Error
member.summary: A warning logged with MSBuild logger. MSBuild tasks also would usually capture cmdline tool console output that qualifies against the warning pattern and report to the logger.

member.name: T:JetBrains.ReSharper.SolutionBuilder.SolBuilderDuo.SolBuildEventWithLocation
member.summary: A build event, plus file-line-column info.
